Name: Flux Card 1
Description: Both Players gain: 4 Magic Dice

Description: Both Players gain: 5 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 11
Description: Both Players gain: 6 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 12
Description: Both Players gain: 7 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 13
Description: Both Players gain: 6 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 14
Description: Both Players gain: 7 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 15
Description: Both Players gain: 8 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 16
Description: Both Players gain: 8 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 2
Description: Both Players gain: 4 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 3
Description: Both Players gain: 4 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 4
Description: Both Players gain: 5 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 5
Description: Both Players gain: 6 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 6
Description: Both Players gain: 5 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 7
Description: Both Players gain: 6 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 8
Description: Both Players gain: 6 Magic Dice

Name: Flux Card 9
Description: Both Players gain: 5 Magic Dice

Name: Living Steel
Description:
The target's Standard Melee Attacks gains +1 to hit, +1 AP, and Magical Attacks.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Corruption of Tin
Description: The target suffers -1 Arm and loses Metal Armour.

Name: Chalice of Gold
Description:
* Can only target Characters. Cannot target model parts containing Mount or Construct.

The target gains one of the following Magic Items: Dragon's Brew, Potion of Healing, Potion of Power Preservation, or Potion of Swiftness.
See the Common Potions and Scrolls.
The target cannot gain an item that they already have unless it has already been activated.

Name: Silver Spike
Description: The target suffers 1 hit with Str 3, AP 10, Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (Str 6, Multiple Wounds (D3)), and Magical Attacks.

Name: Word of Iron
Description: The target gains +2 Arm and Metal Armour.

Name: Quicksilver Lash
Description: The target suffers 2D3+1 hits with AP 4, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks and Zeal (against Metal Armour). These hits Always wound on 4+.

Name: Altered Sight
Description:
The target's Offensive Skill is modified by [α].
No model can be affected by more than one instance of each version of this spell simultaneously.

	Cosmos: [α]: +3

	Chaos: [α]: -3

Name: Truth of Time
Description:
The target's Charge Speed and Mobility are set to [α]. 

	Cosmos: [α]: 8"

	Chaos: [α]: 4"

Name: Weal and Woe
Description:
The target's Melee Attacks to wound rolls are modified by [α] and gain Magical Attacks.

	Cosmos: [α]: +1

	Chaos: [α]: -1

Name: Ice and Fire
Description:
The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4, AP0, and Magical Attacks. Successful [α] against wounds caused by this spell must be rerolled.

	Cosmos: [α]: Regeneration and Aegis Saves

	Chaos: [α]: Armour Saves

Name: Cosmic Scales
Description:
Melee Attacks [α] the target can never hit nor wound on better than 4..

	Cosmos: [α]: allocated against

	Chaos: [α]: allocated by

Name: Thunder and Lightning
Description:
All hits are resolved with Str 6, AP 2, Lightning Attacks and Magical Attacks. The target suffers 3 hits. Before removing casualties, apply [α].

	Cosmos: [α]: The target suffers 1 additional hit

	Chaos: [α]: Select a new Unengaged enemy unit within 6″ of the target: it suffers 2 hits. Before removing casualties, select a 3rd Unengaged enemy unit within 6″ of the 2nd unit: it suffers 1 hit.

Name: Foresight
Description: The target gains +1 Def and +1 Off.

Name: Immortal's Bane
Description: The target gains Divine Attacks and Magic Resistance (3).

Name: The Stars Align
Description: The target gains Hatred

Name: Fate's Judgement
Description:
The target suffers a number of hits equal to the number of Magic Dice on this turn's Flux Card.
Those hits are resolved with Str4, AP2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Augury of Triumph
Description: The target's side gains a bonus to its Static Combat Score bonus equal to the Game Turn number.

Name: Inescapable Doom
Description:
* This spell only ever affects the marked Health Pool.

Mark a Health Pool in the target unit, which has to be Rank-and-File if possible. Place one “Doom” Token on the marked Health Pool, and one at the start of each friendly Magic Phase.

At the end of any friendly Magic Phase, if the target is Unengaged, the Caster may end the spell. If so, remove all corresponding Doom Tokens: for each removed token, the marked Health Pool suffers 3 hits with Str 6, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Fountain of Youth
Description:
* Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6" and be measured from a Field, Forest, Hill, Impassable Terrain, or Water Terrain Feature.

Choose one of the following effects for the target:

• One Health Pool in the target Recovers 1 HP.

• A Rank-and-File part of the target Raises 2 HP.
The Rank-and-File Health Pool cannot start the game as a 'Single model' unit.

Each Health Pool can only be chosen once per Magic Phase.

Name: Entwining Roots
Description:
* Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6" and be measured from a Forest.

The target halves its Charge Speed and Mobility (rounding fractions up), and suffers -2 Agi, to a minimum of 1.

Name: Veil of Mist
Description:
* Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6" and be measured from a Water Terrain Feature.

All units within 12″ of the target when Casting or Shooting suffer a -2 modifier to their Casting Rolls and a -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

Name: Stone Skin
Description:
* Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6" and be measured from an Impassable Terrain.

The target gains +1 Res.
In addition, Melee Attacks allocated towards it never wound on better than 4+.

Name: Shield of Thorns
Description:
* Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6" and be measured from a Field.

The target gains Parry.
For each Standard Melee Attack allocated against the model that rolls a '6' to hit, the attacking model's Health Pool suffers one hit at the same Agility Step, with Str 5, AP 2, and Unmodifiable.

Name: Mud Slide
Description:
* Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6" and be measured from a Hill.

The target must immediately take a Dangerous Terrain (6+) Test, and treats Open Terrain as Dangerous Terrain (6+).
In addition, the target suffers -1 to-hit with its Melee Attacks.

Name: Whispers of the Veil
Description:
The target suffers -1 Res.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Danse Macabre
Description:
The target gains Ghost Step.
In addition, it may immediately perform a Magical Move (4 Mob).

Name: Chorus of the Damned
Description: The target gains Distracting (1)

Name: Touch of the Reaper
Description:
Select one or two models in the target unit.
Each selected model suffers a single hit that wounds automatically, with AP 10 and Magical Attacks.

Name: Spectral Blades
Description: The target gains Dying Blow, and its Standard Melee Attacks always have at least AP 4 and gain Magical Attacks.

Name: Soul Blight
Description: The target suffer 2D3+1 hits with Str 9, AP 10, Magical Attacks and Psychic Attacks.

Name: The Devouring Dark
Description: The target suffers a hit with Area Attack (3x2), Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Blood Curse
Description: The target suffers -1 Off and -1 Def.

Name: Hand of Glory
Description: The target gains Aegis (6+) and Aegis (+1, max. 3+).

Name: Pentagram of Pain
Description:
* The Caster's unit is not targeted.

The target suffers 3 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
If this spell causes at least one HP loss, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

Name: Umbral Majesty
Description:
In each Round of Combat, one model in the target unit gains a 'Majesty' model part, with Duration: Round of Combat.
Select the affected model immediately before the “Majesty” model part allocates its attacks.
The 'Majesty' model part has the following Offensive Profile:

Majesty: Att 6, Off 9, Str 5, AP 2, Agi 8.

Name: The Grave Calls
Description: The target suffers 8 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Fireball
Description: The target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

Name: Flaming Swords
Description: The target gains +1 to wound, Flaming Attacks (Melee & Shooting) and Magical Attacks (Melee & Shooting).

Name: Dragon's Roar
Description: Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Breath Attack (Str 4,  AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks) and Grind Attack (2D6, Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks and Unmodifiable).

Name: Pyroclastic Flow
Description: The target suffers 5D3 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

Name: Pillars of Fire
Description: Standard Melee Attacks from Rank-and-File models in the target are always Str 4 and AP 0, and gain Automatic Hits, Fight in Extra Rank, Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Tidal Flame
Description: The target suffers 1 hit with Str 3, AP 0, Area Attack (5×5), Direct Hit (Str 6, AP2, Multiple Wounds (2)), Flaming Attacks, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Swarm of Insects
Description:
Immediately when the spell is cast, the target suffers 5D6 hits with AP 0 and Magical Attacks, and that always wound on 6+.
In addition, it suffers -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

Name: Savage Fury
Description: The target gains Fearless, Frenzy, Fury and Unruly.

Name: Awaken the Beast
Description: The target gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

Name: Predator's Instinct
Description: The target gains +3" Cha and Resistance (Ranged Attacks).

Name: Wild Guardian
Description:
* This spell only ever affects the marked Health Pool.

Mark a Health Pool in the target. In each Round of Combat one model in the marked Health Pool gains a Guardian Model Part with the Duration: Round of Combat. Select which model immediately before the Wild Guardian allocates its attacks. A unit can never have more than one Wild Guardian Model Part.
The Guardian model part has:

Guardian: Att 4, Off 3, Str 6, AP 3, Agi 3.

Name: Totemic Summon
Description:
* Battlefield Edge.

Summon a Totemic Beast and immediately place it on the Battlefield using Ambush (Target Point).

Name: Smite the Unbeliever
Description:
All hits are Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks. Target suffers D6 +1 hits.

* : select an additional different target to suffer D3+1 hits, following the same targeting restrictions.

x : select a different target to suffer D3+1 hits, following the same targeting restrictions.

Name: Light of Faith
Description:
The target adds +1 to the Combat Score of its side, and gains +1 Dis.

✠ : the target gains Courageous.

x : the target's Charge, Flee, and Pursue rolls are Minimised.

Name: Weight of Judgement
Description:
The target suffers -2 Def, and -2 Agi to a minimum of 1.

✠ : the target suffers -2 Off.

x : the target does not suffer -2 Def (i.e. it only suffers -2 Agi)

Name: Holy Affliction
Description:
The target suffers -1 to wound with its Melee Attacks.

✠ : the target suffers -1 AP.

x : the target gains +1 AP

Name: Wrath of God
Description:
Place a marker on the target point. Do not roll for Divine Intervention when resolving the effects of this spell. You must roll for Divine Intervention at the start of each subsequent Magic Phase:

✠ : each unit with in 2D6″ of the centre of the marker suffers 2D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks. Then remove the marker.

x : your opponent may move the marker up to 3″ in any direction.

Name: Rain of Fire
Description:
The target suffers D3+1 hits. All other units within 3" of the target suffer 1 hit. All hits are resolved with Str 9, AP 4, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

✠ : increase the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.

x : decrease the number of hits each unit suffers by 1.

Name: Mind Fog
Description:
Each Range Attack made by the target that fails its to-hit roll is instead allocated towards the attacking model’s Health Pool with Automatic Hits.
Each Standard Melee Attack made by the target that results in a to-hit roll of ‘1’ to hit, is instead allocated back at allocated towards the attacking model’s Health Pool with Automatic Hits.

Name: Mirror Image
Description:
* Can only target units of Height 0-3.

The next two hits the target would suffer are ignored.
If the target is hit by several simultaneous hits, the owner of the unit chooses which hits to ignore. (Hits that are multiplied into several hits (e.g. due to Fury or Area Attack) are ignored after multiplication.)

Name: Illusory Paths
Description:
Choose which effect to apply when casting the spell:

• The target gains Random Movement (2D6").

• The target gains Random Movement (3D6").

Name: Shrouded Steps
Description:
The target gains Hard Target (1).
In addition, it may immediately perform a Magical Move (6 Mob).

Name: Clouded Sight
Description: The target cannot draw Line of Sight to a target more than 12" away from it.

Name: Cauldron's Curse
Description: The target gains Weakness.

Name: Arise!
Description:
Choose one of the following effects, for each target:

• The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.

• One model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.

The following models cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this sell each Magic Phase:

• Height 4-5 models with Solitary.

• Characters and models with WarPlatform.

Name: Astral Union
Description: The target gains Regeneration (6+) and Regeneration (+1, max. 3+).

Name: Breath of the Lady
Description: Add 2 Blessing Tokens to your pool.

Name: Breath of the Steppe
Description:
Place a round Tornado Marker with a 3" diameter with its centre on the target point. The Tornado Marker must be placed more than 1" away from any unit. The marker is considered Covering Terrain for units inside and/or behind them that contributes to ⟨Soft⟩ {Hard} Cover.

The Tornado Marker is Dangerous Terrain (2 {3}), even for models with Strider.

Name: Chains of Pride
Description: The target gains Unstable and Fearless. {Targets with Supernal cannot take Break Tests.}

Name: Children of Umi
Description: All Melee Attacks allocated against the target suffer -1 to wound.

Name: Curse of Nezibkesh
Description:
The target gains an Incendiary Marker, and suffers -1 Def and -1 Off.
In addition, for as long as the target contains an Incendiary Marker it suffersan additional -1 Def and -1 Off.

Id: curse of the phantom queen/hereditary spells
Name: Curse of the Phantom Queen
Description:
Attacks made by the target suffer -1 AP.
Attacks made against the target gain +1 AP.
Attacks from spells are not affected.

Name: Duty is Eternal
Description: The target gains +1 Res.

Id: echoes of the dark forest/hereditary spells
Name: Echoes of the Dark Forest
Description:
The target gains Fearless.
In addition, it may immediately perform a Magical Move (5 Mob).
This spell may target units in Ambush. If so, the target unit immediately enters the Battlefied following normal Ambush rules, instead of performing a Magical Move.

Name: Favour of Meladys
Description:
The target  gains 2 Protection Tokens which are removed when the spell ends. When a friendly unit within 18" of the target suffers a wound, after Armour Saves have been taken, but before any Special Saves are taken, the target may discard a Protection Token and ignore the wound applying the following rules:

• Rank-and-File models of Height 1 ignore up to 2 wounds per token (provided they are suffered simultaneously).

•  Characters, and models of Height 4 or 5, can each only ignore a single wound per Phase.

• Wounds from attacks with Multiple Wounds are not ignored, they inflict one less wound instead.

Name: Forest Embrace
Description:
Place a Forest * underneath the target until the last model in the unit is removed as a casualty. This Forest always extends up to the edges of the target's Unit Boundary (even if the unit moves or changes formation). Whenever the target is within 3″ of another Forest or an another unit entirely with Sylvan Spirit, it must reroll to-hit and to-wound rolls of ‘1’ with its Melee Attacks.

* You may place a marker next to the unit instead

Name: Frostbite
Description: If this spell targets a friendly unit, the target gains +1 Armour. If this spell targets an enemy unit, the target suffers -1 Armour. {This spell may target two units instead of one (declare the additional target before the Casting Attempt).}

Name: Guile and Fury
Description:
Can be cast in one of two versions:

• Augment: cannot be cast by a Goblin.

The target gains +1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are increased by 1".

• Hex: cannot be cast by an Orc.

The target suffers -1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1".

Name: Hellfire
Description:
The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 6, AP 0, and Magical Attacks.

* This spell can target units Engaged in Combat and in contact with the Caster's Front Facing.

Name: Iovanis' Thunder
Description: The target suffers 2D3 hits with Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks, Magical Attacks, and Maniacal Enthusiasm (To-wound roll).

Name: Spear of Infinity
Description: The target suffers 1 hit with Str 2, AP 2, Area Attack (1x5), Direct Hit (Str 4, AP 3, Multiple Wounds (2)), and Magical Attacks. The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Str for each spell successfully cast before this spell in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

Id: tempest of the storm witch/hereditary spells
Name: Tempest of the Storm Witch
Description: The target may immediately perform a 12" Magical Move and loses Scoring. {In addition, the target gains Coastal Predator.}

Id: aura of power - chalice of gold/bound spells
Name: Aura of Power - Chalice of Gold
Description:
The model can cast Chalice of Gold (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell.

* Can only target Characters. Cannot target model parts containing Mount or Construct.

The target gains one of the following Magic Items: Dragon's Brew, Potion of Healing, Potion of Power Preservation, or Potion of Swiftness.
See the Common Potions and Scrolls.
The target cannot gain an item that they already have unless it has already been activated.

Id: aura of power - ice and fire/bound spells
Name: Aura of Power - Ice and Fire
Description:
The model can cast Ice and Fire (Cosmology) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4, AP0, and Magical Attacks. Successful [α] against wounds caused by this spell must be rerolled.

	Cosmos: [α]: Regeneration and Aegis Saves

	Chaos: [α]: Armour Saves

Name: Book of the Dead
Description:
The bearer can cast a unique Bound Spell: Unfinished Duty.

Choose one of the following effects for each target:

• The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises a number of HP equal to its Resurrected value.

 • One model in the target Recovers a number of HP equal to its Resurrected value.

Name: Carved Wisdom - Silver Spike
Description:
The model can cast Silver Spike (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 1 hit with Str 3, AP 10, Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (Str 6, Multiple Wounds (D3)), and Magical Attacks.

Name: Carved Wisdom - Fate's Judgement
Description:
The model can cast Fate's Judgement (Divination) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers a number of hits equal to the number of Magic Dice on this turn’s Flux Card. Those hits are resolved with Str4, AP2, and Magical Attacks.

Id: carved wisdom - swarm of insects/bound spells
Name: Carved Wisdom - Swarm of Insects
Description:
The model can cast Swarm of Insects (Shamanism) as a Bound Spell.

Immediately when the spell is cast, the target suffers 5D6 hits with AP 0 and Magical Attacks, and that always wound on 6+.
In addition, it suffers -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

Id: carved wisdom - the devouring dark/bound spells
Name: Carved Wisdom - The Devouring Dark
Description:
The model can cast The Devouring Dark (Occultism) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers a hit with Area Attack (3x2), Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Ceinran's Scales
Description:
The bearer can cast Whispers of the Veil (Evocation) as a BoundSpell.

The target suffers -1 Res.
No model can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

Name: Dark Prelate - Blood Curse
Description:
The bearer can cast Blood Curse (Occultism) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers -1 Off and -1 Def.

Id: dark prelate - pentagram of pain/bound spells
Name: Dark Prelate - Pentagram of Pain
Description:
The bearer can cast Pentagram of Pain (Occultism) as a Bound Spell.

* The Caster’s unit is not targeted.

The target suffers 3 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.
If this spell causes at least one HP loss, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

Name: Dengrai's Ice Storm
Description:
The model can cast Veil of Mist (Druidism) as a Bound Spell.

* Alternatively, the Range can be set to 6″ and be measured from a Water Terrain Feature.

All units within 12″ of the target when Casting or Shooting suffer a -2 modifier to their Casting Rolls and a -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks.

Name: Exemplar's Flame
Description:
The bearer can cast Corruption of Tin (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers -1 Arm and loses Metal Armour.

Name: Firebrand
Description:
The model can cast Dragon's Roar (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell.

Choose a single model part in the target unit when casting the spell. This model part gains Breath Attack (Str 4,  AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks) and Grind Attack (2D6, Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks and Unmodifiable).

Name: Firestarter - Spear of Infinity
Description:
The target suffers 1 hit with Str 2 [5], AP 2, Area Attack (1x5), and [Multiple Wounds (2)].
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Str for each other non-Attribute Spell successfully cast in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

Name: Firestarter - Smite the Unbeliever
Description:
The target suffers D6 hits with Str 5, AP 2, and Magical Attacks.

✠: choose an additional different target for the spell, following the normal targeting restrictions.

x: choose a new target for the spell, following the normal targeting restrictions.

Name: Golden Idol of Shamut
Description:
The bearer can cast Flaming Swords (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell.

The target gains +1 to wound, Flaming Attacks (Melee & Shooting) and Magical Attacks (Melee & Shooting).

Name: Holy Relic
Description:
The model can cast Fate's Judgement (Divination) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers a number of hits equal to the number of Magic Dice on this turn's Flux Card. Those hits are resolved with Str4, AP2, and Magical Attacks.

Name: Icon of the Infinite
Description:
The bearer can cast Hellfire (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 2D6 hits with Str 6, AP 0, and Magical Attacks.

* This spell can target units Engaged in Combat and in contact with the Caster's Front Facing.

Name: Kherp Sceptre
Description:
The wielder can cast Danse Macabre (Evocation) as a Bound Spell.

The target gains Ghost Step.
In addition, it may immediately perform a Magical Move (4 Mob).

Name: Lash of Souls
Description:
The model can cast Pentagram of Pain (Occultism) as a Bound Spell.

The target suffers 3 hits with Str 5, AP2, and MagicalAttacks. If this spell causes at least one HP loss, the Caster of the spell Recovers 1 HP.

Name: Monster Munch
Description:
* Battlefield Edge.

The bearer can cast Totemic Summon (Shamanism) as a Bound Spell.

Summon a Totemic Beast and immediately place it on the Battlefield using Ambush (Target Point).

Name: Necromantic Staff
Description:
The wielder gains Channel (1), and can cast Arise! (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell, with the following above changes. Choose one of the following effects, for each target:

 • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.
 • One model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.

The following models can not Recover more than 2 HP from this spell each Magic Phase:

 • Height 4-5 models with Solitary.
 • Characters and models with WarPlatform.

Name: Relic Shroud
Description:
The bearer can cast Breath of the Lady (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell.

Add 2 Blessing Tokens to your pool.

Name: Ritual Bloodletter
Description:
While the wielder's unit is Engaged in Combat, the wielder can cast Hand of Glory (Occultism) as a Bound Spell.

The target gains Aegis (6+) and Aegis (+1, max. 3+).

Name: Rod of Battle
Description:
The bearer can cast a unique Bound Spell: Rod of Battle
The target's Melee Attacks gain +1 to hit and Magical Attacks.

Name: Soul Tether
Description:
The wielder gains Channel (1), and can cast Arise! (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell, with above changes.

Choose one of the following effects, for each target:

 • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr value.
 • One model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr value.

The following models can not Recover more than 2 HP from this spell each Magic Phase:

 • Height 4-5 models with Solitary.
 • Characters and models with WarPlatform.

Name: Surge of Mad Spirits
Description:
Ashotet can cast a unique Bound Spell: Surge of Mad Spirits.

The target must take a Courage Test rolling an additional D6. If failed, it suffers a number of hits equal to the amount by which the test was failed. Those hits wound automatically and have AP 10.

Id: symbol of the warborn alliance/bound spells
Name: Symbol of the Warborn Alliance
Description:
The model can cast Guile and Fury (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell. Each time the model attempts to cast that Bound Spell, the owner may freely choose which version to cast. Can be cast in one of two versions:

Augment: cannot be cast by Goblin.
The target gains +1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are increased by 1″.

Hex: cannot be cast by Orc.
The target suffers -1 to hit, and its Charge Range, Flee Distance, and Pursuit Distance are reduced by 1″.

Name: The Dead Arise
Description:
The model can cast The Dead Arise as a Bound Spell.

Summon a Skeletons or Zombies unit. Declare which when selecting the target. The unit has a number of Health Points corresponding to its Rsr. All upgrades except Command Group Options are allowed.

Note: all models must be placed within the spell's Range, with at least one model touching the target point.

Name: Potion of Healing
Description:
The bearer's model Recovers 1 HP.

Note: Height 1-4 only.

Name: Potion of Power Preservation
Description: May be used immediately when a Casting Rollor Dispel Roll fails, due to not rolling high enough: do not discard the Magic Dice used in this unsuccessful attempt.

Name: Potion of Swiftness
Description: +3 Agi

Name: Dragon's Brew
Description: Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Stand and Shoot).

Name: Binding Scroll
Description:
One use only. Duration: One Phase
 Can be activated during the opponent’s 'Siphon the Veil' (Magic Phase, step 2).
When activated, choose a Caster and select one of their spells (Bound or Learned): the chosen Caster cannot voluntarily cast the selected instance of this spell, e.g. if a caster has the same spell more than one time, only a single instance cannot be cast, and this has no effect on Magical Mishap.

Name: Scroll of Draining
Description: May be activated in the opponent's Magic Phase, immediately after Excess Magic: the opponent immediately discards 1 Magic Dice.

Name: Scroll of Power
Description:
Wizards only.

May be activated immediately after a Casting Roll: the bearer may add one additional free Magic Dice to this Casting Roll. (The limit of 5 Magic Dice still applies).

Id: scroll of the free mind/potions & scrolls
Name: Scroll of the Free Mind
Description:
Wizard Apprentice, Wizard Adept or Wizard Master only.

When activated the bearer selects a Path from among the Paths they can select during List Creation.
They then replace all Learned Spells with spells from the selected Path, replacing the first with the #1, spell the second with the #2 spell and so on, until they have replaced all their Learned Spells.
Spells granted by other sources than Wizard Apprentice, Wizard Adept or Wizard Master are unaffected,and this does not change the bearer’s Path Selection.

Note: This means a single Wizard can gain the same spell twice, yet still not cast the same spell multiple times.

Example: a Vampire Wizard Adept with Gates of the Netherworld that selected #1, and #3 from Occultism and swapped to Arise! during List Creation selects Evocation with Scroll of the Free Mind, now knows Whispers of the Veil twice. Danse Macabre, and Arise!.

Name: Spell Scroll
Description:
Wizards only.

May be activated at any time during your Magic Phase.

The bearer knows the spell indicated in brackets (X) in addition to its other spells, unless the bearer already knew it.

Name: DE - Beastmaster's Vial
Description:
May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat.

One friendly unit entirely with Beast within 12"of the bearer gains Dying Blow.

Name: EoS - Scroll of Conquest
Description:
Knight Commanders, and Marshals with Horse only.

Units within 6" of the bearer must reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

Id: he - scroll of the pearl throne/potions & scrolls
Name: HE - Scroll of the Pearl Throne
Description:
Choose a Magic Item from an enemy unit that is in contact with the bearer. This Magic Item is ignored.
Note: If it was an Enchanted Weapon or Enchanted Shield, the mundane effects of the Weapon or Shield can still be used.

Name: KoE - Black Knight's Tonic
Description: The first time the model suffers an unsaved wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), it gains Immune (Multiple Wounds).

Name: OnG - Moon Shrooms
Description:
Cannot be activated at the same turn as War Cry!.

The bearer's unit gains the effects of Warcry as if the General had used it this turn.

Name: ONG - Gnasher Bait
Description: Friendly Gnasher and Gnasher Dasher units within 18" gain Frenzy, Fury, and their Charge Range rolls are Maximised.

Name: SA - Stampede Resonator Crystal
Description:
May be activated at the start of any Charge Phase.

Choose one friendly unit containing models with Height 4-5 within 18": the chosen unit loses Stomp Attack and gains Impact Hits (X hits), where ‘X’ is equal to the amount of hits from its Stomp Attack (if a model already had Impact Hits, increase the number of hits by its amount of Stomp Attack instead).

Name: SA - Te Aupouri Smokestone
Description: May be activated when a friendly unit fails a Break Test (after any rerolls): enemy units within 18" of the bearer have their Charge Range, Pursuit Distance, and Overrun Distance rolls Minimised.

Name: SE - Sacred Seeds
Description:
May be activated at the end of any friendly Movement Phase, if the bearer is Unengaged.
Place a Forest, in contact with the bearer and at least 1" away from enemyunits and other Terrain Features.
This Forest has the dimensions of a 10"x6" rectangle. It follows the normal Forest rules, except it is Dangerous Terrain (6+) instead of any other instance of Dangerous Terrain.

Name: SE - Song of Cenyrn
Description:
May be activated when the bearer's unit Declares a Charge.
The target of the Charge can only declare Hold! as its Charge Reaction, unless it is Shaken.
The enemy unit may still declare Charge Reactions as normal if charged by other units.

Name: UD - Scroll of Desiccation
Description: During Pre-game Selections, choose a Field, Forest, or Water Terrain, that has not been placed during Pre-game selections: it ceases to be the Terrain Feature it used to be and loses its Terrain Rules. It becomes a Desert Terrain Feature with Dangerous Terrain (6+) for all enemy units.

Name: VS - Favanite Powder
Description: When casting a Hex spell, after seeing the result of the roll, the bearer can choose to gain Maniacal Enthusiasm (Casting Roll).

Id: vs - potion of rat form/potions & scrolls
Name: VS - Potion of Rat Form
Description:
During any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer can choose to lose Attached (if they had it) and make perform a Magical Move (6 Mob).
It must end this move by joining another friendly unit (following the normal rules for joining units).

Name: WDG - Wyrd Stone
Description: The bearer's model gains Hard Target (2).

Id: attached & teach by example/bh - ghaa!, the quiet muzzle
Name: Attached & Teach by Example
Description: Ghaa! becomes Attached and gains Teach by Example

Id: sleeper, solitary, & ambush/bh - ghaa!, the quiet muzzle
Name: Sleeper, Solitary, & Ambush
Description: Ghaa! gains Sleeper, Solitary, and Ambush (Field, Forest, Water Terrain).

Name: Gnarled Hide Totem
Description: The target gains +1 Arm and Distracting (1).

Name: Blooded Horn Totem
Description: The target gains +1 Att and Melee Attacks gain +2 AP.

Name: Clouded Eye Totem
Description: The target gains Hard Target (1) and Magic Resistance (3).

Name: Black Wing Totem
Description: The target gains +2" Cha and +3 Agi.

Id: wild form - strength/bh - wild form armour
Name: Wild Form - Strength
Description: The bearer gains -1 Res, +1 Str, and +1 AP.

Id: wild form - resilience/bh - wild form armour
Name: Wild Form - Resilience
Description: The bearer gains +1 Res, -1 Str, and -1 AP.

Id: dance of c a edhren/de - the black rose's dances
Name: Dance of C a edhren
Description: The Black Rose can use Make Way, even if she is already in contact with an enemy model, provided she moves into contact with an enemy Character in her unit’s Front Facing.

Id: dance of c e inran/de - the black rose's dances
Name: Dance of C e inran
Description:
Nominate one enemy Character model in contact with The Black Rose. The Black Rose and the selected Character always have 0 Attacks, and no attacks nor hits can be assigned to either.
At Agility Step 0, The Black Rose rolls 1D3, Maximized, and the selected Character rolls 1D3.
If either model rolls lower, it loses a number of Health Points equal to the difference between the two rolls.

Id: dance of nabh/de - the black rose's dances
Name: Dance of Nabh
Description: The Black Rose gains Hatred (against Characters) and Zeal (against Characters). Attacks against the Black Rose gain +1 to hit.

Id: rune of r e vocation/dh - battle runes
Name: Rune of R e vocation
Description:
Ignore all other spell effects on the target from spells with Duration: One Turn.
The target unit gains Magic Resistance (2), which is also applied to friendly spells.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune Bound Spell simultaneously.

Id: rune of r e ckoning/dh - battle runes
Name: Rune of R e ckoning
Description:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Hatred.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Hatred.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune Bound Spell simultaneously.

Name: Rune of Oaths
Description:
Friendly models in the target unit gain Zeal.
Melee Attacks by friendly models towards the target gain Zeal.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune Bound Spell simultaneously.

Id: rune of r e s olve/dh - battle runes
Name: Rune of R e s olve
Description:
The target gains Swiftstride, and until the end of the Player Turn it also gains Light Troops.
In addition, the target may immediately perform a Magical Move (4 Mob).

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune Bound Spell simultaneously.

Name: Rune of Gleaming
Description:
The target gains Distracting (1) and Hard Target (1).

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune Bound Spell simultaneously.

Id: rune of r e s ilience/dh - battle runes
Name: Rune of R e s ilience
Description:
To-wound rolls against the target suffer a -1 modifier.

No model can be affected by more than one instance of the same Battle Rune Bound Spell simultaneously.

Name: Strength & AP
Description: Hold Guardians unit gains +1 Str and +1 AP

Name: Agility & Vanguard
Description: Hold Guardians unit gains +3 Agi and Vanguard

Name: Stout Ale
Description: Tador Berafrig's unit gains Fearless, Stubborn, and Unruly.

Name: Bitter Ale
Description: Tador Berafrig's unit gains Fury, Hatred, and Unruly.
Tador Berafrig's unit gains Lethal Strike, Unruly, and Zeal.

Name: Ullor's Blessing
Description: The target gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks).

Name: Sunna's Blessing
Description: The target's unit gains Flaming Attacks. Each enemy unit in contact with the target's unit when the spell is cast, suffers D6 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.

Name: Volund's Blessing
Description: The target's unit gains Zeal.

Name: Brace for Impact!
Description: The target gains Fight in Extra Rank

Name: On The Double!
Description: The target gains +1″ Cha and +2″ Mob.

Name: Ready! Aim! Fire!
Description: The target gains Accurate

Name: Steady, Men!
Description: The target gains Disciplined, and its Courage Tests gain Minimised

Id: cut the head of the snake!/eos - heinrich falkenbach - divine jurisdiction
Name: Cut the head of the Snake!
Description: The target gains First Strike (Hatred (against Characters)) and Fury (Units containing a Character).

Id: aim for the weak spot!/eos - heinrich falkenbach - divine jurisdiction
Name: Aim for the Weak Spot!
Description: If an attack with Aim for the Weak Spot! wounds with a to-wound roll of '6', neither Aegis nor Regeneration Saves can be taken against it, including against models with Aegis or Regeneration Saves with conditional applications.

Id: riddle of the lamassu - power/id - riddle of the lamassu
Name: Riddle of the Lamassu - Power
Description:
Riddle of the Lamassu: During the opponent's Pre-game Selections, the opponent must choose 'Power' or 'Wisdom'.

 • Power: the model gains Channel (1).

Id: riddle of the lamassu - wisdom/id - riddle of the lamassu
Name: Riddle of the Lamassu - Wisdom
Description:
Riddle of the Lamassu: During the opponent's Pre-game Selections, the opponent must choose 'Power' or 'Wisdom'.

 • Wisdom: immediately choose up to two units from the opponent's ArmyList: the chosen units begin the game with an Incendiary Marker.

Id: orison of s h ielding/koe - blessing tokens
Name: Orison of S h ielding
Description: The target gains Aegis (5+).

Id: orison of s t riking/koe - blessing tokens
Name: Orison of S t riking
Description: The target gains +2 Off, Magical Attacks, and ignore Parry. Model parts with Mount are not affected.

Name: Orison of Discipline
Description: The target's Discipline is set to 9.

Name: Goblin Gardens - Field
Description: All Field terrain features are treated as Dangerous Terrain (6+) instead of any other instance of Dangerous Terrain. In addition, friendly models with Goblin gain Strider (Field).

Name: Goblin Gardens - Forest
Description: All Forest terrain features are treated as Dangerous Terrain (6+) instead of any other instance of Dangerous Terrain. In addition, friendly models with Goblin gain Strider (Forest).

Name: Goblin Gardens - Ruins
Description: All Ruins terrain features are treated as Dangerous Terrain (6+) instead of any other instance of Dangerous Terrain. In addition, friendly models with Goblin gain Strider (Ruins).

Id: goblin gardens - water terrain/ong - goblin gardens
Name: Goblin Gardens - Water Terrain
Description: All Water Terrain terrain features are treated as Dangerous Terrain (6+) instead of any other instance of Dangerous Terrain. In addition, friendly models with Goblin gain Strider (Water Terrain).

Id: bluehoove goat stew/ok - valish's eru's secret recipes
Name: Bluehoove Goat Stew
Description: Valish's unit gains +2 Mob, Strider

Id: trollbear goulash/ok - valish's eru's secret recipes
Name: Trollbear Goulash
Description:
Valish's unit gains Regeneration (6+), Recovers a single HP on a model in the Chefling's unit.
Note: Attached models cannot be Raised unless specified.

Id: stonecold soup/ok - valish's eru's secret recipes
Name: Stonecold Soup
Description: Valish's unit gains Channel (1), Courageous and Disciplined

Id: colony of frogs/se - ancient dawael, the world tree
Name: Colony of Frogs
Description:
Add the following Offensive Model Part to Ancient Dawael:

Frog (6): Att 1, Off 2, Str 2, AP 0, Agi 4, Toxic Attacks

Ancient Dawael gains Strider (Water Terrain).

One use only. Duration: One Turn. May be activated at the start of any Player Turn. Friendly units entirely with Sylvan Spirit within 12" of Ancient Dawael gain Immune (Flaming Attacks).

Id: murder of crows/se - ancient dawael, the world tree
Name: Murder of Crows
Description:
Add the following Offensive Model Part to Ancient Dawael:

Crow (6): Att 1, Off 2, Str 2, AP 0, Agi 4, Afflict (−1 Combat Resolution).

Ancient Dawael gains Hatred (against Flying) and Afflict (−1 Def).

One use only. Duration: One Turn. May be activated at the start of any Player Turn. Choose an enemy unit within 24" of Ancient Dawael. All models with Fly in the chosen unit halve their Charge Range and Mobility, rounding fractions up.

Id: nest of vipers/se - ancient dawael, the world tree
Name: Nest of Vipers
Description:
Add the following Offensive Model Part to Ancient Dawael:

Viper (6): Att 1, Off 2, Str 2, AP 0, Agi 4, Poison Attacks.

Ancient Dawael gains Immune (Poison Attacks).

One use only. Duration: One Turn. May be activated at the start of any Player Turn. Friendly units entirely with Sylvan Spirit within 12″ of Ancient Dawael gain: ‘Enemy units in contact with this unit lose Devastating Charge.'

Id: dance of bedevilments/se - dances of cenyrn
Name: Dance of Bedevilments
Description: Unit gains Afflict (-1 Dis), and enemy units in contact can not claim Combat Score bonus from their Proper Ranks.

Id: dance of biting wind/se - dances of cenyrn
Name: Dance of Biting Wind
Description: Unit gains +1 AP and Lethal Strike.

Id: dance of the parting mists/se - dances of cenyrn
Name: Dance of the Parting Mists
Description: Unit gains -1 Str, -1 AP, and Aegis (3+).

Id: dance of whirling blades/se - dances of cenyrn
Name: Dance of Whirling Blades
Description: Unit gains +1 Att.

Name: Spirit Arrows
Description:
When attacking with this weapon, before rolling to hit, choose one model with Channel in the target unit.
The chosen model replaces its rule Channel (X) with Channel (X–1).

Id: undying will/ud - crown of the pharaohs
Name: Undying Will
Description:
At the start of every friendly Player Turn, the wearer may lose Undying Will. If so, choose a friendly unit with in 12″: this unit gains Undying Will, with Duration: OneTurn.

Undying Will
R&F model parts with Skeleton in units containing Undying Will gain +2 Def, +2 Off, Lethal Strike, Magical Attacks, and replace their Shooting Weapons’ Aim with (4+).
Model parts with Mount are not affected by Undying Will.

Name: Regeneration
Description: At the beginning of 'Vanguard Units' (Battle Setup, step 3.F), and at the start of each friendly Player Turn, choose a friendly unit containing Statue within 18″: all models with Statue gains Regeneration (5+).

Id: countless daggers/vs - the shadowslice stalker's panoply
Name: Countless Daggers
Description: The Shadowslice Stalker gains First Strike (+2 Att), Paired Weapons and Throwing Weapons (2+).

Id: Darkstone Rod/vs - the shadowslice stalker's panoply
Name: Darkstone Rod
Description: The Shadowslice Stalker gains +2 Str, Lightning Attacks and Multiple Wounds (2)

Id: senator's toga/vs - the shadowslice stalker's panoply
Name: Senator's Toga
Description: The Shadowslice Stalker gains +2 Dis, Commanding Presence (6″)

Name: Abiding Spirit
Description:
The Exalted Herald gains Hard Target (1).

It has access to Hand of Glory (Occultism).

Id: brand of the dragon/wdg - exalted herald manifestations
Name: Brand of the Dragon
Description:
The Exalted Herald gains Breath Attack (Str4, AP1, Flaming Attacks), Fly, and Swiftstride.

It has access to The Devouring Dark (Occultism).

Id: emissary of chaos/wdg - exalted herald manifestations
Name: Emissary of Chaos
Description:
The Exalted Herald gains Battle Fever and Stomp Attack (D6 hits).

It has access to Pentagram of Pain (Occultism).

Name: Sorcerer Immortal
Description:
The Exalted Herald gains Veil Walker.

It has access to Umbra Majesty (Occultism) and The Grave Calls (Occultism).

Name: Unholy Avatar
Description:
The Exalted Herald gains +1Str,+1AP, and Divine Attacks.

It has access to Blood Curse (Occultism).

Name: Supernal Shield
Description: The chosen unit suffers -3 Arm and gains Aegis (5+).

Name: Unholy Edge
Description: The chosen unit always strikes at Agility Step 0 and gains +1 AP.

Id: the eight-point crown/wdg - joulgrim's father's gifts
Name: The Eight-Point Crown
Description: The chosen unit suffers -1 Str and -1 AP, and gains Stubborn and Unstable.

Name: False Hydra
Description: Mraven gains Breath Attack (Str 3, AP 1), Rage, and Regeneration (4+).

Name: Giant Yeti
Description: Mraven sets his Height to 5, gains +1 Res, Stomp Attack (D6 hits), and Touch of Frost.

Name: Wasteland Spearback
Description:
Mraven gains Channel (1), and the following shooting weapon:

Shoot Spikes: Aim 3+, Range 12", Shots 2D3+2, Str 5, AP 2, March and Shoot

Name: Debauched Gortach
Description: Mraven gains Hatred, Lethal Strike, and Strength from Flesh.
